sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Activity, Play, Square, Clock, Target, Video, Youtube, TrendingUp, AlertCircle, CheckCircle, Settings } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = ({ status, onTriggerAutomation, onStopAutomation }) => { const [config, setConfig] = useState({ language: 'english', upload_to_youtube: false, trending_region: 'AU', script_tone: 'energetic' }); const [recentVideos, setRecentVideos] = useState([]); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ total_videos: 0, success_rate: 0, avg_duration: 0 }); useEffect(() => { // Fetch recent videos and stats const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await fetch('/api/videos'); const data = await response.json(); setRecentVideos(data.videos.slice(0, 5)); // Show only last 5 setStats({ total_videos: data.total, success_rate: 95, // Mock data avg_duration: 58 // Mock data }); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard data:', error); } }; fetchData(); }, [status.running]); // Refresh when automation status changes const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon: Icon, color = "blue", subtitle }) => (

{title}

{value}

{subtitle &&

{subtitle}

}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Dashboard

Monitor and control your YouTube automation

{/* Advanced Controls */}
{/* Status Bar */} {status.running && (
Automation Running

{status.current_step}

{status.progress}% complete

)} {/* Error Display */} {status.error && (
Error

{status.error}

)} {/* Stats Cards */}
{/* Recent Activity */}
{/* Recent Videos */}

Recent Videos

{recentVideos.length > 0 ? ( recentVideos.map((video, index) => (

{video.title}

{video.topic} • {Math.round(video.duration)}s • {video.created_at}

{video.youtube_url && ( )}
)) ) : (

No videos generated yet

)}
{/* System Status */}

System Status

API Status Online
YouTube API Connected
OpenAI API Active
ElevenLabs API Active
Last Run {status.last_run ? new Date(status.last_run).toLocaleString() : 'Never'}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

); }; export default Dashboard;
